name: myWLV
description: myWLV is currently available to all University of Wolverhampton students who are fully enrolled on an undergraduate or postgraduate course that is primarily delivered on a University campus, and research students. If you are not part of this group, you will see only a help tile when you log in.  The myWLV mobile app provides an easy-to-use, personalised and effective system. The app provides you with everything you need in one place and with notifications to keep you updated, myWLV will be your go-to app for your learning and education experience.  There is also a desktop version available via any web browser which provides access to the same apps and data, for a seamless experience - any changes you make to the mobile dashboard on your desktop will be synced to the mobile app to make personalisation super-easy.
